Verse.Text: خودی بلند تھی اس خوں گرفتہ چینی کی کہا غریب نے جلاد سے دم تعزیر ٹھہر ٹھہر کہ بہت دل کشا ہے یہ منظر ذرا میں دیکھ تو لوں تاب ناکی شمشیر

ZEST FOR SIGHT How lofty was that Chinese Self who for crime was condemned to death on eve of his beheading, he asked headsman, ‘Stop for a span or breath.’ He asked for stoppage many times, for it was very pleasant scene, he wished to see for moments few the sword's great-glimmer, glow and sheen. (Translated by Syed Akbar Ali Shah)
